lines.text: If I lie, I wish my tongue dries off.
That's a great idea. About a tongue.
What? You also have an internal voice?

You know, next dead body is going to be yours, and the killer is going to be me! Next time, when I need something to be announced to the whole city of Paris, I wont do it as I usually do - go to the tv and newspapers - I will simply share it with you as a secret.
